tools.dialogDescription: Debug and test tools provided by MCP servers
tools.inputHint: Please enter parameters in JSON format
tools.title: MCP Tools
tools.description: Tools provided by the MCP server
tools.enableToUse: Please enable MCP to use tools
tools.enabledDescription: Enable MCP functionality to use tool calls
tools.jsonInputPlaceholder: Enter the parameters in JSON format

confirmDelete.description:
Are you sure you want to delete the server {name}? 
This operation cannot be cancelled.
confirmDelete.title: Confirm deletion

confirmRemoveServer:
Are you sure you want to delete the server {name}? 
This operation cannot be cancelled.
description: Manage and configure MCP (Model Control Protocol) servers and tools
enableToAccess: Please enable MCP first to access configuration options
enabledDescription: Enable or disable MCP features and tools
resetConfirmDescription:
This action restores all default servers while retaining your customized servers. 
Any modifications to the default server will be lost.

serverForm.autoApproveHelp: Select the operation type that requires automatic authorization and execute without user confirmation
serverForm.baseUrlPlaceholder: Enter the server basic URL (for example: http://localhost:3000)
serverForm.envInvalid: Environment variables must be in valid JSON format
serverForm.envPlaceholder: Enter environment variables in JSON format
serverForm.jsonConfigIntro: You can directly paste the JSON configuration or choose to configure the server manually.
serverForm.jsonConfigPlaceholder: Please paste the JSON format configuration of the MCP server
serverForm.name: Server name
serverForm.nameRequired: The server name cannot be empty

title: MCP Settings

Artifacts.desc: Make your McpChat output diversified Artifacts content
Artifacts.name: Artifacts

buildInFileSystem.desc: Enable McpChat to manipulate local files
buildInFileSystem.name: File system

imageServer.desc: After opening, any model in McpChat can understand images and generate images.
imageServer.name: Image Service

powerpack.desc: Provide enhanced capabilities such as time query, web information acquisition and secure code execution for any large model, so that the model has more powerful and accurate information acquisition capabilities.
powerpack.name: Enhancement Toolkit

difyKnowledge.desc: Dify Knowledge Base Search Service, which can retrieve content in Dify Knowledge Base
difyKnowledge.name: Dify Knowledge Base Search

ragflowKnowledge.name: RAGFlow Knowledge Base Search
ragflowKnowledge.desc: RAGFlow knowledge base search service, can search RAGFlow knowledge base content

fastGptKnowledge.name: FastGPT Knowledge Base Search
fastGptKnowledge.desc: FastGPT knowledge base search service, can search FastGPT knowledge base content

mcpchat-inmemory/custom-prompts-server.desc: McpChat built-in custom prompt word service
mcpchat-inmemory/custom-prompts-server.name: Custom prompt words

mcpchat-inmemory/deep-research-server.desc: McpChat built-in in-depth research service based on Bocha Search (note that long context models are required to be used, and models with insufficient context may fail)
mcpchat-inmemory/deep-research-server.name: DeepResearch

mcpchat-inmemory/auto-prompting-server.name: Auto Template Prompting
mcpchat-inmemory/auto-prompting-server.desc: Automatically selects the most suitable custom prompt based on user input and intelligently fills the prompt template.

mcpchat-inmemory/conversation-search-ser.name: Conversation History Search
mcpchat-inmemory/conversation-search-ser.desc: McpChat built-in conversation history search service, can search historical conversation records and message contents

prompts.parametersHint: Please enter the parameters in JSON format, support automatic formatting
prompts.dialogDescription: Debug and test prompts provided by MCP servers

resources.pleaseSelect: Click to get display Resources details
resources.dialogDescription: Browse and view resources provided by MCP servers

errors.setEnabledFailed: Failed to set MCP enabled state
errors.getServerStatusFailed: Failed to get server status for {serverName}
errors.maxDefaultServersReached: Maximum number of default servers (30) reached
errors.toggleDefaultServerFailed: Failed to toggle default server status
errors.resetToDefaultFailed: Failed to reset to default servers

mcpGallery.title: MCP Plaza
mcpGallery.noServersDescription: You haven't added any MCP servers yet. Add a server to start using tools and features.
